tax_brackets.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1950'
tax_brackets.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. The full bracket structure is unknown. The values here are approximations based on search results indicating a 76.5% top rate. The lower rate and threshold are assumptions.

ietc.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. The structure of low-income tax relief in 1950 is unknown.

wff.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. WFF did not exist. The rules for historical family assistance programs are unknown.

ppl.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. Paid Parental Leave scheme of 1950 is unknown.

child_support.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. Child support rules for 1950 is unknown.

acc_levy.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1950'
acc_levy.notes: This represents the 'Social Security Income Tax' of 7.5%. The name 'acc_levy' is used due to the current data structure. There was no income cap mentioned for this tax.
